Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Well, if it isn't Link.<sp:0:4:0>So you are investigating the geoglyphs,
too, then? How diligent of you.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Have you perhaps discovered geoglyphs
in other regions, Link?
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Link, I have been thinking about your
vision of Zelda.<sp:0:4:0>Could it be that the princess somehow...
Hmm... I wonder.
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I'm not entirely sure what it all means,
but I did find an interesting entry in an
old manuscript.
Dragon's Tears are...well, what the name
would imply. They're shed as a dragon
ascends to the heavens.
But this is the first I've ever heard of
dragons crying...
